# Data wrangling so far

From DataCamp.com's "Introduction to the Tidyverse" (Chapters 1 & 2), I'm also assuming you know: 

.pull-left[

- how to print a tibble

- how to install a package (`install.packages("dplyr")`, 1x per machine)

- how to load an installed package (`library(dplyr)`, 1x per work session))

- `dplyr::filter`

- `dplyr::arrange`

- `dplyr::mutate`
]

.pull-right[

- `<-` (variable assignment)
- `%>%` (then...)
- `dplyr`, `ggplot2` (packages)

  - `library(dplyr)` (1x per work session)
]
